article_title: Kasich: Proposed Muslim ban dooms Trump’s presidential aspirations
article_text:
GOP presidential hopeful John Kasich says during Myrtle Beach stop Tuesday that politics of division is dividing the party and country

Vows to repeal Obamacare mandates

Pledges to freeze bureaucratic regulations

article_metadata.title: Kasich: Proposed Muslim ban dooms Trump’s presidential aspirations | The State

og.description: Donald Trump’s demand that all Muslims be banned from entering the U.S. because of recent terrorist attacks in California and Paris will break his support among the Republican party faithful, GOP presidential hopeful John Kasich said Tuesday.
og.title: Kasich: Proposed Muslim ban dooms Trump’s presidential aspirations
